summary: A lil re-texture for the basic steel sword.
descriptionHtml:
So this is only a lil re-texture for the basic steel sword. I use this with Epic Skyforge Steel Weapons -mod (by rage0976) so that it applies only for the skyforged steel sword which I use as my weapon-of-choise in the game.

INSTALL:
just add the texture into your textures folder (..\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons\\Steel) if you don\'t have a textures file in data-folder then just create one.

if you use the epic skyforge steel weapons -mod  put it into ..\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons\\SkyforgeSteel

Hope you like it, endorse if you do!
author: MonkeyOnJET
